[[AFinalCoalgebraTheorem.pdf]]

#### Definition
Two F-Coalgebras $(X, h)$ and $(Y, g)$ are said to be Aczel-Mendler Bisimilar if there exists a [[Span]] $(R, ..)$ such that the following [diagram bi-commutes](https://tikzcd.yichuanshen.de/#). 




Note:
this is Bonchi's definition of F-Bisimulation
